alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:59PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Judith Basin and southwestern Fergus Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Moore, or 21 miles southwest of Lewistown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Hobson, Moore, Danvers, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Glengarry, Hilger, Buffalo and Garneill. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 51 and 86. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 2, and between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for central Montana.
